template.name: ipfs
template.description: IPFS and IPFS Cluster monitoring templates

trigger.name: Cluster Peer Below Threshold
trigger.description: Triggered when the current number of cluster peers is below the configured threshold

trigger.name: IPFS Cluster Daemon Error
trigger.description: Triggered when there is an issue an IPFS Cluster daemon

trigger.name: IPFS Cluster Pin Error
trigger.description: Triggered whenever there is an issue with one or more pins on an IPFS Cluster node. This only checks local error status

trigger.name: IPFS Cluster Pin Queue Backlogged
trigger.description: Triggered if the amount of local queued pins on an IPFS Cluster node surpasses a certain value

trigger.name: IPFS Daemon Offline
trigger.description: Triggered whenever the IPFS daemon is no longer online

trigger.name: IPFS Low Peer Count
trigger.description: Triggered when the current number of IPFS peers is below the optimal value

trigger.name: Non Writable IPFS Datastore
trigger.description: Triggered whenever we can't write to the ipfs datastore, indicating a serious issue, such as a read-only filesystem
